name: UIAccessibilityReadingContent
desc: Methods to implement for an object that represents content that users read, such as a book or an article.

items.name: func accessibilityLineNumber(for: CGPoint) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the line number that contains the specified point.

items.name: func accessibilityAttributedContent(forLineNumber: Int) -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Returns the styled text associated with the specified line number.

items.name: func accessibilityContent(forLineNumber: Int) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the text associated with the specified line number.

items.name: func accessibilityFrame(forLineNumber: Int) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the onscreen frame associated with the specified line number.

items.name: func accessibilityAttributedPageContent() -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Returns the styled text displayed on the current page.

items.name: func accessibilityPageContent() -> String?
items.desc: Returns the text displayed on the current page.
